actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize a project for flood protection in and in the vicinity of Baytown, Texas.

summary.text: Authorizes a project for flood protection in the vicinity of Baytown, Texas, at an estimated cost of $12,700. Provides that both the $15,000 limitation imposed under the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 and any changes in the fair market value of the property caused by subsidence or flooding after February 13, 1969, shall be disregarded in compensating owners of the property who owned it at the time of flooding.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a project for flood protection in and in the vicinity of Baytown, Texas.
